thread.title: Diane Paterson

author: Diane Paterson
title: Diane Paterson
text: We wanted to get a good food for Thor as he was having bad dry skin issues and was losing his fur and getting little blister type things on his belly, we tried a few varieties before we came across this one. His skin has never been in better condition plus he loves the flavour of thefood and it is not to expensive, it's about the same per month as we were paying for the pedigree chum we were using so win win all around especially for Thor.
